content.raw:
We know that using `ogre2` is one way of getting a null Grid, but from this function, we can't be sure that this is exactly what happened. How about just printing something like `"Failed to create grid for scene [" << _scene->Name() << "] on engine [" << _scene->Engine()->Name() << "]"`?

On a related note, it would be nice if Ignition Rendering were printing something too, instead of failing silently.
